name: squiggly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of a line or lines that curve and twist in a way that is not regular: squiggly lines When I awoke, I felt dizzy and I could see squiggly things in front of my eyes. See
squiggle
More examplesFewer examplesHis handwriting was like a mass of squiggly lines on the paper.She switches to Arabic in the squiggly characters of the Arabic alphabet.We drove home via squiggly little back roads.
